description.intro page: On this page, all of the names are referenced or used in the games ({{smm1Link}} {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro references: These are used in the {{StoryMode}} ({{smm2Link}} exclusive), by a {{MysteryMushroom}} ({{smm1Link}} exclusive) or in the editor (in general).
description.viewable: The content can be viewed as either a {{listLink}} or a {{cardLink}}.

description.intro page (all): On this page, all of the {{course}} {{tags}} are only used in {{smm2Image}}.
description.intro page (official): On this page, all of the {{official}} {{course}} {{tags}} are only used in {{smm2Image}}.
description.intro page (unofficial): On this page, all of the {{unofficial}} {{course}} {{tags}} are only used in {{smm2Image}}.
description.intro page (makerCentral): On this page, all of the {{MakerCentralLink}} {{course}} {{tags}} are only used in {{smm2Image}}.
description.intro references: These are used to represent {{courses}} that are {{officialLink}}, {{unofficialLink}} or in {{MakerCentralLink}}.
description.viewable: The content can be viewed as either a {{listLink}} or a {{cardLink}}.

description.intro page: On this page, all of the voices are used only in the editor.
description.intro games: They are also on every games ({{smm1Link}} {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro smm1: There are some voices in {{smm1Link}} that are no longer used in {{smm2Link}}.
description.intro characters: Some that are only applicable to the characters.
description.intro variants: There might be variant of a same {{entityLink}} in the {{underwaterLink}} or as an {{europeanVariantLink}}.
description.viewable: The content can be viewed as either a {{listLink}} or a {{cardLink}}.

property.While playing → LCL: While we play, it is in the {{acronym}} ({{limit}})

description.intro page: On this page, all of the {{gameStyles}} are present in the games ({{smm1Link}}, {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro sm3dw: But, there is only {{smm3dwImage}} that is specific to {{smm2Link}}.
description.intro entity: Also, there is some {{entityLink}} specific to a selected game style ({{smbLink}}, {{smb3Link}}, {{smwLink}}, {{nsmbuLink}}, {{sm3dwLink}}).
description.viewable: The content can be viewed as either a {{listLink}}, a {{cardLink}} or a {{tableLink}}.

description.intro page: On this page, all of the instruments are present in the games ({{smm1Link}}, {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro variants: And some instruments in {{smm2Link}} are the same as in {{smm1Link}} / {{smm3dsLink}}.
description.viewable: The content can be viewed as either a {{listLink}} or a {{cardLink}}.

note.Crash online if met: Crash the online room ({{multiplayerVS}} / {{multiplayerCoop}}) if the limit is met
note.In a single frame: Is only doable in a single frame of gameplay

description.intro page (all): On this page, all of the limits are used in the games ({{smm1Link}}, {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro page (editor): On this page, all of the editor limits are used in the games ({{smm1Link}}, {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro page (play): On this page, all of the play limits are used in the games ({{smm1Link}}, {{smm3dsLink}} or {{smm2Link}}).
description.intro game changes: From {{smm1Link}} and {{smm3dsLink}} to {{smm2Link}}, some limits were added.
description.intro other entities: And other entities have a different limit associated to them.
description.intro references: These are used to represent limits that are {{playLink}} or {{editorLink}}.
description.viewable: The content can be viewed as either a {{listLink}}, a {{cardLink}} or a {{tableLink}}.

trigger.After land + jump: After the {{player}} is landing & a jump is made
trigger.Turn after full speed: After the {{player}} is turning around (after being at full speed)
trigger.After 3 seconds → no movement (continuou: After 3 seconds of non-movement (it repeat itself continuously)
trigger.Get in entity: When a {{player}} is getting [into / on / grabbed] a {{clownCarImage}}, {{lakituCloudImage}}, {{shoeImages}}, {{yoshiImages}}, {{dryBonesShellImage}} or {{swingingClawImage}}
trigger.Lose life: When a {{player}} is losing a life
trigger.Take damage | Lose life: When a {{player}} is taking damage or losing a life

Official notification.hit ? Block near Purple Toad: Hit the middle {{entityImage}} near the {{characterImage}} in the {{StoryMode}}.
Official notification.finish rebuilding castle: Finish rebuilding the castle in the {{StoryMode}}.

course.receive feedback (a lot): Receive a lot of feedback on a {{course}}.

Official notification.high score: Reach a high score of {{amount}} or more {{courses}} in {{EndlessChallenge}} ({{difficulty}}).
Official notification.place: Be in the {{position}} place{{medalImage}} in the worldwide {{leaderboard}}.

nightEffect.Wind: Depending on the {{gameStyle}}, there is different wind effect.

nightDesertWindEffect.→ periodic: The wind blows to the right periodically
nightDesertWindEffect.← periodic: The wind blows to the left periodically
nightDesertWindEffect.↔ periodic: The wind blows from left and right alternately periodically
nightDesertWindEffect.→ constant: The wind blows to the right constantly

nightEffect.Low gravity: Has a low gravity and some {{entities}} behave like in the {{underwaterImage}}.
